title: Instructional Design Scenario for Improving Mental Health Awareness: Real Experience-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mental health concepts, possessing intermediate expertise in mathematics curriculum
context.additional_context: Hybrid classroom environment aimed at improving awareness and reducing stigma around mental health issues linked to the mathematics curriculum, utilizing real patient experiences and video materials.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the main types and symptoms of mental health issues with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze and present social stigmas related to mental health using three or more specific case examples.
Learners can propose two or more data-driven approaches (e.g., statistical analysis) to address mental health issues within a mathematical curriculum context.

resources: Mental Health Patient Experience Video Materials
Real-World Case Documents on Mental Health

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
